docstring.long_description:
Use the SOURCE_2450 block to change the source settings.

Requires a CONNECT_2450 block to create the connection.
docstring.short_description: Turns the source output on or off.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_2450 block).

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Turn the output on or off.
